function funcc() if difficult then set_item("it-extralife",47,30) else if placew==0 then set_item("it-extralife",47,30) placew=1 elseif placew==20 then placew=0 else placew=placew+1 end end fd=random(200)+400 enigma.SetAttrib(ai,"hit_factor",fd) xd=random(10000)/4000-1.25-.25 xyd=random(10000)/5000-1 yxd=random(10000)/5000-1 yd=random(10000)/6400-0.78125 enigma.SetAttrib(sp,"hit_distortion_xx",xd) enigma.SetAttrib(sp,"hit_distortion_xy",xyd) enigma.SetAttrib(sp,"hit_distortion_yx",yxd) enigma.SetAttrib(sp,"hit_distortion_yy",yd) end
doit=true function funcc2() x,y=enigma.GetPos(z1) if doit and x==55 and y==25 then SendMessage(t1,"on") SendMessage(t2,"on") if difficult then set_actor("ac-rotor", 40.5,32.5, {range=100,force=4,prefercurrent=1}) end set_actor("ac-top", 43.5,34.5, {range=100,force=3,prefercurrent=1}) doit=false end end
function funcc3() enigma.SetAttrib(z1,"mouseforce",enigma.GetAttrib(z1,"mouseforce")+random(300)/400-.375) enigma.KillStone(0,0) if difficult then set_stone("st-timer",0,0,{on=1,interval=random(random(800)+1)/20+0.2,action="callback",target="funcc3",name="t1"}) else set_stone("st-timer",0,0,{on=1,interval=random(random(1600)+1)/20+0.2,action="callback",target="funcc3",name="t1"}) end end
function funcc4() if enigma.GetItem(39,25)~=nil then if enigma.GetKind(enigma.GetItem(39,25))=="it-wormhole" then enigma.KillItem(39,25) set_item("it-wormhole",39,25,{targetx=42.5,targety=33.5,range=random(100)/20,strength=random(40)-20}) end end if enigma.GetItem(56,35)~=nil then if enigma.GetKind(enigma.GetItem(56,35))=="it-wormhole" then enigma.KillItem(56,35) set_item("it-wormhole",56,35,{targetx=42.5,targety=33.5,range=random(100)/20,strength=random(40)-20}) end end enigma.KillStone(1,0) set_stone("st-timer",1,0,{on=1,interval=random(random(600)+1)/20+0.2,action="callback",target="funcc4",name="t2"}) end
